vlive.korean: [이해가 안 가는 갈등, 분쟁, 모략, 험담 분야 최고 위원] 셔누에 대한 불만이 1도 없어요 진짜? So there's not one complaint to SHOWNU? 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 39회 - 셔리더체제, 이대로 좋은가(사실은..)
vlive.english: So there's not one complaint to SHOWNU?

vlive.korean: 분쟁이 크게 있었죠. - 네. It was a bit trouble. - Yes. 듣기 View video KIM TAE WOO : 김태우의 10주년 '하고 싶은 말' (KIM TAE WOO 10th Anniv. ‘Words I'd Want To Say’)
vlive.english: It was a bit trouble. - Yes.

vlive.korean: 이거 저작권 분쟁하지 않나요? Would it infringe copyright? 듣기 View video AKMU : [AKMU의 사춘기노트 p.9] '꿈'
변호사님이 분쟁이 발생한다고 하시네요. You said it's a start of conflict. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : 언타이틀 - 'A.De와 함께하는 언타이틀'
vlive.english: You said it's a start of conflict.

vlive.korean: 2010년에 소속사와 분쟁이 있었어요. And then, I had a trouble with my agency. 듣기 View video KIM TAE WOO : 김태우의 10주년 '하고 싶은 말' (KIM TAE WOO 10th Anniv. ‘Words I'd Want To Say’)
vlive.english: And then, I had a trouble with my agency.

examples.korean: There is no machinery for resolving disputes. 발음듣기 분쟁 해결을 위한 기구가 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There is no machinery for resolving disputes. 발음

examples.korean: Settling the dispute required great tact and diplomacy. 발음듣기 그 분쟁을 해결하는 데는 대단한 요령과 외교술이 요구되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Settling the dispute required great tact and diplomacy. 발음

examples.korean: Their purpose is to adjudicate disputes between employers and employees. 발음듣기 그들의 목적은 노사분쟁을 재결하는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their purpose is to adjudicate disputes between employers and employees. 발음

examples.korean: Both sides committed themselves to settle the dispute peacefully. 발음듣기 양측 모두 그 분쟁을 평화적으로 해결하겠다고 약속했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Both sides committed themselves to settle the dispute peacefully. 발음

examples.korean: The negotiators are trying to make peace between the warring factions. 발음듣기 협상자들이 분쟁 중인 그 파벌들 간에 평화를 이뤄 내려고 애쓰고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The negotiators are trying to make peace between the warring factions. 발음
